attributes.action: Fund free STI Testing for all in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
If regular STI testing was available discreetly to be delivered once again and we didn’t have to pay more than £20 for a kit then less people would have them because less people would spread them unknowingly. 

STIs can be life changing. Protect yourself and others
attributes.background: 1 in 12 young people are infected with an STI and don’t know it because they do not have symptoms.

rejection.details:
Testing for sexually transmitted infections (STIs) is already available through the NHS: https://www.nhs.uk/live-well/sexual-health/visiting-an-sti-clinic/

If what you want is for the Government to provide funding to make STI test kits available to order through the post we could accept a petition calling for this in England, but healthcare is a devolved matter in Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland.
